tool_description: An API showing informations about formula one such as specified season statistics, race results, final standings etc.
name: Formula 1 all time statistics
title: Formula 1 all time statistics

api_list.name: Get All Statistics In Specified Category From Specified Season
api_list.description: The endpoint can return all race results, fastest lap awards, final (or current) championship standings. You can also specify a certain team or driver to see certain informations about them.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://formula-1-all-time-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/2021/races/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "formula-1-all-time-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://formula-1-all-time-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/{season}/{category}/{filter}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "formula-1-all-time-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
